game.name: Horse Care and Riding
game.description: If you ever wanted to know how is like to own a horse and take care of him yourself, this game might show you the major view of the whole idea. Take a closer look and play this animal game where you get a nice stallion to be yours to look after. Go through the caring process among the dress up part that is forwarded by the most wanted one, the riding. Have fun and let us do it.
